title: Lame Castle HD v1.57
description:
Lame Castle is an intense auto-runner with beautifully hand-drawn art. Throw on some armor, hop on a wooden horse, and win over the princess by destroying Wizzy the evil wizardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Lame Castle.

Destroy castles across 24 levels while punting chickens, looting treasure chests, and smashing rocks. There are also 4 unique endless challenge modes so you can punt chickens Ã¢â‚¬Ëœtil the end of time.

Controls:

-Press the left side of the screen to JUMP and DOUBLE JUMP 
-Hold to jump further 
-Press the right side of the screen to ATTACK
-If you've picked up a power attack you will dash through the air when attacking

What's New:

Removed a bunch of permissions
Removed Open Feint because the creator of Open Feint no longer supports it (sorry OF fans)
